index.title: KekAccount
nav.title: KekAccount
footer.notice: This awesome opensource account system was made with ❤️ by KekOnTheWorld and it's contributers. Check it out on Github!
register.keky.step0: Hello, today we will create your own KekAccount.
register.keky.step1: I am keky and will help you.
register.keky.step2: Let's start simple. What's your name?
register.keky.step4: Now what's your email address? (as example kekontheworld@gmail.com)
register.keky.step6: Please enter a password which you will use to login.
register.keky.step7: I haven't quite understood you. Can you repeat it?
register.keky.step8: Faboulous! I'll create an account for you...
register.keky.step9: Now just the verification is missing. You should receive an email with a verification code. You can already login
register.keky.email.exists: There already exists an account with that email address.
register.keky.email.invalid: You have to enter a valid email address.
register.keky.username.invalid: The username must be in between 3 and 32 characters long.
register.keky.username.exists: A user with that username already exists. Please choose another one.
register.keky.password.weak: Your password is too weak. It must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one number and one letter.
register.keky.password.space: Your password may not contain spaces!
login.title: Login
login.description: Here you can login to your account.
dashboard.title: Dashboard
hint.verify: Please verify your account! Non verified accounts may get deleted!
account.title: Account
account.description: Here you can change your account settings
account.delete.confirm: This will delete your account and erase all your data.
apps.title: Apps
apps.description: Here you can manage your apps.
tokens.title: Tokens
tokens.description: Here you can manage your tokens.
tokens.create.description: Here you can create a new token. Back
tokens.create.name: Name
confirm.title: Confirm
confirm.description: Please confirm that you're the owner of this Account.
api_error.description: An error occured while contacting the api. Please try again later.
users.title: Users
users.description: Search a user by its' name.
